author: USA TODAY, David Jackson, USA TODAY
title: 'Time to #FireFauci?' Donald Trump retweets a call for Dr. Anthony Fauci's dismissal
description: Trump and Fauci, director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, have disputed each other vaccines and hydroxychloroquine.
content:
WASHINGTON  President Donald Trump generated new questions about the fate of his anti-coronavirus policy team by retweeting a post that called for firing Anthony Fauci.
Trump did not explicitly endorse the call to remove Fauci in his Sunday tweet, but in rec… [+3334 chars]
